name: AnesthesiaRequiringMonitoredCare
title: Anesthesia Requiring Monitored Care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for  regional anesthesia and conscious sedation),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for regional anesthesia and conscious sedation),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts for local nerve blocks)
